meta.description: Language labels for backend labels belonging to extension 'sf_register'

languageKey.label: defines in edit mode if the fields get filled with data of logged in user
comma separated list of words used in bad word validator
Uid of the page to redirect to after the user is saved (not after confirmation)
Uid of the page to redirect to after the creation is confirmed (not after saving)
Wether the email address should be used as username
Mode of password encryption: if saltedpassword is installed it overrides selection made here
plaintext no encrytion at all
md5-hash of password
sha1-hash of password
Use encrypted filename: to deny direct access on uploaded files
plaintext no encrytion at all
md5-hash of password
sha1-hash of password
whether the admin needs to activate the user account
whether the admin should get notified about the activation of the user account
whether the user needs to activate his account
whether the user should get notified about the activation of his user account
whether the admin get an notification about the creation of an user account. If an activation email was send this wont be send afterwards.
whether the user get an notification about the creation of the account. If an activation email was send this wont be send afterwards.
whether the user should get logged in after registration
whether the user should get logged in after activation
usergroup set if an account waits for activation
usergroup set if the account was activate
usergroup set if no activation is needed
Name of the site used in email subject
from name used in email to user
from email used in email to user
reply name used in email to user
reply email used in email to user
email address where a reply message goes to
to name used in email to admin
to email used in email to admin
from name used in email to admin
from email used in email to admin
reply name used in email to admin
reply email used in email to admin
email address where a reply message goes to
Sysfolder that contains the usergroups and users if not set zero or a selected value in the plugin will be used for storing the user
comma separated list of words used in bad word validator
Uid of the page to redirect to after the creation is confirmed (not after saving)
whether the user should get logged in after registration
whether the user should get logged in after activation
usergroup set if an account waits for activation
usergroup set if the account was activate
Name of the site used in email subject
Name used in every occurance of emails
Address used in every occurance of emails
TypoScript complexity: wether to show minimal or maximal settings
minimal
maximum
Set realurl config by default: In case you have a separate config for realurl or the default settings dont suite your needs you would like to disable this
